headline: TJX (TJX): A Fresh Look at Valuation Following Renewed Analyst Confidence and Strong Performance
summary: It is not every day that you see the market zero in on TJX Companies (TJX), but a wave of analyst reports highlighting the company’s unique advantages has definitely put it back on investors’ radar. Lately, the main talking points have centered on TJX’s flexible buying approach and that “treasure hunt” shopping experience that keeps loyal shoppers coming back. Combine this with strong financial results and upbeat institutional sentiment, and it is easy to see why analysts and investors are...
